item.title: How do i make a command list
item.dc:creator: @teh_war_of_noobs teh war of noobs
item.description:

}
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”) && (playerRights >= 0)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
sendQuest("@dgr@Commands", 8144); //Title
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("", 8145);

just put in between the quotations what u want to say, something like this
sendQuest(“what u want to say”)… PUT THIS IN THE CLIENT.JAVA!!!
